titleStmt.title: Contemplations and devotions on the severall passages of our blessed Saviors death and Passion. Written by Charles Herle, Master in Arts, and sometimes of Excester Colledge in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Herle, Charles, 1598-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Mat[hewes] for Humphrey Robinson, dwelling in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the three Pidgeons,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A⁶ B-2A¹² .
With four final contents leaves followed by a blank leaf.
Running title reads: Contemplations vpon Christs Passion.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
